articles.title: Johannesburg building fire: Death toll rises to 52 in South Africa - CNN
articles.description: The death toll from a raging fire in a five-story building in central Johannesburg has risen to 63, according to the city’s emergency services.
articles.content:
The death toll from a raging fire in a five-story building in central Johannesburg has risen to 63, according to the citys emergency services.

articles.title: Twitter Reactions: Mitchell Marsh, Tanveer Sangha power Australia to their biggest victory over South Africa in T20Is - Cricket Times
articles.description: The first T20I encounter between South Africa and Australia, part of the Australia tour of South Africa 2023, took place at Kingsmead in Durban on Wednesday. After winning the toss, South Africa chose to bowl first, setting the stage for a competitive battle.…

articles.title: 52 Killed After Massive Fire At 5-Storey Building In S Africa's Johannesburg - NDTV
articles.description: The death count from a fire that engulfed a five-storey building in central Johannesburg on Thursday has risen to 63, the South African city's emergency services said.
articles.content:
It was not immediately clear what caused the blaze, which broke out overnight.
